messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Sharon of the Swamp
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/3/2003 3:34:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Is Sharon of the Swamp still on this list?  She
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/3/2003 3:34:14 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Is Sharon of the Swamp still on this list? She lives right there as well
and is about as cool an unschooler as you would want to meet.<<<

She IS. The boys and I went and spent a weekend with her two years ago.

She sent Roy to school recently and is not on any unschooling lists anymore.
Her reason for school was her isolation---Roy needed someone other than his
mom everyday.

Broke my heart. She's just outside of Jacksonville. I have her address if
anyones interested.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
